items.title: Audit existing architecture
items.summary: Understand current system architecture, technologies, and design patterns

items.title: Map system dependencies
items.summary: Identify internal and external dependencies, integrations, and data flows

items.title: Scaffold documentation structure
items.summary: Create docs/architecture/ mirroring code folder structure for documentation

items.title: Assess technical debt
items.summary: Identify areas of technical debt, outdated code, and improvement opportunities

items.title: Review existing documentation
items.summary: Gather and review available docs, READMEs, and architectural decision records

items.title: Identify key entry points
items.summary: Document main entry points, APIs, and user-facing interfaces

items.title: Document core components
items.summary: Fill in documentation stubs for critical domain slices and infrastructure

items.title: Create test coverage plan
items.summary: Assess current test coverage and plan for filling gaps

items.title: Add critical missing tests
items.summary: Write tests for untested critical paths and core functionality

items.title: Update documentation
items.summary: Create or update documentation to reflect current system state
